articles.description: Asset managers sell greenback at fastest pace in a year as market prices in more rate cuts next year
articles.content: Investors are selling dollars at the fastest rate in a year as they raise their bets that the US Federal Reserve has finished its aggressive campaign of interest rate increases and will deliver multi… [+4772 chars]
